psid.h
1 #pragma once
2 
3 // Minimum and maximum header length
4 const int PSID_MIN_HEADER_LENGTH = 118; // Version 1
5 const int PSID_MAX_HEADER_LENGTH = 124; // Version 2
6 
7 // Offsets of fields in header (all fields big-endian)
8 enum {
9  PSID_ID = 0, // 'PSID'
10  PSID_VERSION = 4, // 1 or 2
11  PSID_LENGTH = 6, // Header length
12  PSID_START = 8, // C64 load address
13  PSID_INIT = 10, // C64 init routine address
14  PSID_MAIN = 12, // C64 replay routine address
15  PSID_NUMBER = 14, // Number of subsongs
16  PSID_DEFSONG = 16, // Main subsong number
17  PSID_SPEED = 18, // Speed flags (1 bit/song)
18  PSID_NAME = 22, // Module name (ISO Latin1 character set)
19  PSID_AUTHOR = 54, // Author name (dto.)
20  PSID_COPYRIGHT = 86, // Copyright info (dto.)
21  PSID_FLAGS = 118, // Flags (only in version 2 header)
22  PSID_RESERVED = 120
23 };
24 
25 struct PsidHeader {
26  std::string fileName;
27  unsigned int tracks;
28  unsigned int initAddress;
29  unsigned int replayAddress;
30  unsigned int loadAddress;
31  unsigned int defaultTune;
32  char title[512];
33  char author[512];
34  char copyright[512];
35  char model[32];
36  unsigned int type;
37  std::string typeName;
38  unsigned int version;
39  unsigned int current;
40  unsigned char *playerCode;
41  unsigned int *playerLength;
42 };
43 
44 // Read 16-bit quantity from PSID header
45 inline unsigned short readPsid16(const unsigned char *p, int offset)
46 {
47  return (p[offset] << 8) | p[offset + 1];
48 }
49 
50 // Read 32-bit quantity from PSID header
51 inline unsigned int readPsid32(const unsigned char *p, int offset)
52 {
53  return (p[offset] << 24) | (p[offset + 1] << 16) | (p[offset + 2] << 8) | p[offset + 3];
54 }
55 
56 extern bool psidChangeTrack(int direction);
57 extern void printPsidInfo(PsidHeader &psidHdr_);
58 extern PsidHeader &getPsidHeader();
59 extern void getPsidProperties(PsidHeader &psidHdr_, char *text);
